posts.post_content: Come on, I know its overpriced but speaking about limited - removal always deserves top picks, so they have to make a few occasional "bad" removal cards. And - would you really want to see a card that for 2-3 CMC instantly destroys very good cards that EVERYONE plays (talking about Myr) AND draws you a card? Not to mention it is pretty good with proliferate and is actually never a dead card - you can always shrink their creature while drawing a card... Its no Doom Blade, but it deserves higher marks

posts.post_content:
Removal is removal. Even if it's weak and costs a lot, some decks will still need this if they can't get their hands on better removal. If you have a few proliferate mechanics it's not even 'entirely' pathetic.  
  
Still... very expensive, when you consider Fume Spitter costs 1 for the same effect without a cantrip, AND you get a 1/1 body in the deal.

Posted By: littlebeast (2/18/2011 2:22:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I was browsing through the lowest-rated cards on Gatherer and I was amazed that this one was anywhere near the bottom. Thing is, it's not a bad card - I play it every time I get the chance in a booster draft where I'm using any black. It's usually a two-for-one, especially in Limited - where there are no shortage of X/1s to kill. Instant speed is also great - it's a nice combat trick.  
  
I rated this 4/5, for its utility in Limited and how fun it is to play.
